examples.example: 每天放学的时候，我都和小伙伴们开心地走在回家的路上。

translate.english: Every day when school is over, I walk happily on the way home with my little friends.

examples.example: 放学铃声一响，同学们带着灿烂的笑容纷纷走出校门。

translate.english: As soon as the school bell rang, the students walked out of the school gate one after another with bright smiles.

examples.example: 放学之后，同学们欢快地奔向操场进行各种有趣的活动。

translate.english: After school, the students happily run to the playground to carry out various interesting activities.
